CHANGELOG

v2.0 (Jan 17, 2026) =================

ADDED

- class character sheets for all official character classes, including playtest variants

- 4, 6, 8, 10 and 12-step clocks to the set of conflict cards

CHANGED

- PC guide
	- rewrote the Rituals and Projects sections to more fully include all of their rules

- NPC character sheet
	- added MP, target, and effect columns to the list of NPC spells
